MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G76 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Busby Road and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:45pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network near Busby Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:03pm on Sunday, 06 December 2020
